> Ok....but you will have to wait till grounded gets back
>
>

>

there.
> >  >

> >  >
> >  > > Stranato heard the sounds going away. He sighed and continued
through
> > the
> >  > > tunnel, heading back towards the entrance to his hole...

> >  > > To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>

the
> > tunnel,
> >  > > now.

those

> >  > > once

> >  > >  > > To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>

> >  > >  > >  > cuts in a sharp angle into the bot's new tunnel and begins
to
> > follow

stronger,
> > he
> >  > >  > > must be
> >  > >  > >  > >  > close."
> >  > >  > >  > >  > He begins to head towards the vibrations.

through
> >  > > another
